snippet.title: Immediate (PC-88) — Game Showcase (イミディエイト）
snippet.description:
Immediate Gameplay | イミディエイト プレイ動画 
Developer: Ambientworks
Genre: Adventure
Released: 2020
Platform: PC88

Description:
This is a brand new doujin game released in 2020 for PC-88. The game take place in an unnamed "city" that exist in a totalitarian world full of mass surveillance and censorship. The gameplay consist of watching an online video-sharing site knows as Immediate while learning more about the world and its secrets. The developer describes the game as a "dystopian adventure game of the near future".

You can buy the OST and download the game for free here: https://ambientworks.booth.pm

00:00 れもんルート
56:56 フューシャルート
他のエンディングもあるようです。

Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzxHKbKxYksg6o26a8pzgVstNQ4VohREo
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Game_Curiosity
